subject: Steroids
Law and Legislation
Drug Abuse and Traffic
lead_paragraph: President Bush asked the Senate to swiftly approve an agreement ratified by more than 70 nations to fight the use of steroids and other performance-enhancing drugs in sports. In a statement, the White House said the agreement’s principles were already reflected in United States law and policy.
